content: this legal text discusses the division of assets among three individuals referred to as gl cm and cd the assets include several apartments a garage and a courtyard located in osimo italy cm is allocated the ground floor apartment a garage and a portion of the first floor cd is allocated the first floor apartment and a portion of the attic gl is allocated the right to use an apartment on the first floor the value of each share is specified in the text the document is signed by a notary and the parties involved
